http://download.yousendit.com/EC7C9B6A0B4730C2 (6MB) contains mp3 samples of both dates, a jpeg comparing the peaks and spectrals of the inferior Paris sources, and cover artwork (also in the torrent).

http://download.yousendit.com/5B7EC824090A5A19 (100MB) contains mp3 files of this recording (VBR 320bps).

the password for the zip files in both downloads=
magicriver

if the yousendit downloads expire, I'll re-upload if you post to a Patti mailing list.
